notes.text: ComboBox: new "itemPressed" parameter added to the change event
New landing page for shopping card demo app
SAP Icons v3.8 update

sap.m.BrowserShcrollbar: HCB and HCW scroll corner color
sap.m.Button: Bidirectional algorithm implemented
sap.m.Button: UI Adaptation Combine added
sap.m.ComboBox: Dropdown opening mechanism using keyboard improved
sap.m.ComboBox: Highlighting values after filtering
sap.m.CustomTreeItem: New control added
sap.m.DatePicker: Specific dates or date ranges can now be displayed as non-working
sap.m.FeedListItem: Properties convertLinksToAnchorTags, convertedLinksDefaultTarget introduced
sap.m.GenericTile: New overflow concept for GenericTile in line mode implemented
sap.m.IconTabHeader: Unselected state is implemented
sap.m.IconTabHeader: Usability on small screens is now improved
sap.m.Input: New function closeSuggestions
sap.m.InputBase: ESC key now triggers liveChange with additional parameters
sap.m.MessageItem - more generic message container
sap.m.MessageView - generic control implementation
sap.m.MessageView: Grouping property introduced
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: When active, only the value is clickable
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: 1 month view for S and M sizes
sap.m.Popover: HCW and HCB arrow styling based on Belize
sap.m.RatingIndicator belize hcb and hcw
sap.m.SplitApp: Tooltip for the master button is now added
sap.m.StepInput: Handle more than one decimal places
sap.m.UploadCollection: Grouping of items enabled
sap.tnt.IconTabHeader: sap.m.IconTabHeader is now correctly displayed inside sap.tnt.ToolHeader
sap.ui.demo.iconexplorer: new icon explorer demo app

IconTabBar: Issue with data bindings in the SelectList

SplitContainer: Issue with nesting SplitContainers
ValueStateMessage: '\n' breaks the text to a new line
core.Popup|m.Dialog: consider window scroll for positioning
m.PlanningCalendar: Rows resize properly depending on the container width

m.ResponsivePopover: connect the internal popup control instance direct to static UIArea
sap.m.ActionListItem: Double focus issue is fixed.
